name: File Relative Path
author: Leandro Keene C. Manalon

sections.description:
File Relative Path is a Word Press plugin used to convert relative path’s(url) instead of absolute. All your file tags inside the Post (Post Type), Pages, Archive’s like images, audio, video and also iframe was converted.

NOTE: Please always read the changelog for the plugin updates.

Plugin Options

Default Functions
Once you activate the plugin they already have a Default functionality. All your images paths(url) inside the Post, Pages and Archive’s was converted to relative instead of absolute (url).
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.
1. Upload the entire file-relative-path folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
3. Use the Tools->File Relative Path screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Why should I install this plugin?

What is the benefit of this plugin ?

This is very helpful plugin. You can changes(convert) all your absolute paths(url) to relative paths(url) in a single click.

May I select the File tags which I want to be shown as relative format ?

Yes, you can filter what File tags you want to be relative.

What will happen when I remove this plugin?

When you remove the plugin all the File tags inside your website converted into relative paths(url).

NOTE: This functions is for all the Filter tags you select in the Plugin Settings.

short_description: This plugin allows you to change the absolute url to relative url format.
